title: President Trump To Accept $400 Million Plane Gifted From Qatar
description: President Donald Trump will accept a luxury Boeing 747-8 jumbo jet as a gift from the ruling family of Qatar with the intention of converting it to a presidential aircraft, the “palace in the sky” potentially being the most valuable gift ever extended to the United States from a foreign government. What do you think? The post President Trump To Accept $400 Million Plane Gifted From Qatar appeared first on The Onion.
author: The Onion Staff
excerpt: President Donald Trump will accept a luxury Boeing 747-8 jumbo jet as a gift from the ruling family of Qatar with the intention of converting it to a presidential aircraft, the “palace in the sky” potentially being the most valuable gift ever extended to the United States from a foreign government. What do you think?
text: President Donald Trump will accept a luxury Boeing 747-8 jumbo jet as a gift from the ruling family of Qatar with the intention of converting it to a presidential aircraft, the “palace in the sky” potentially being the most valuable gift ever extended to the United States from a foreign government. What do you think? “Foreign competition will completely destroy the American bribe industry.”  Theodore Coleman, Train Custodian “Does Trump even know how to fly a plane?” Paige Albers, Triathlon Applauder “Qatar is going to be so embarrassed when Trump realizes the plane was rebribed.” Hugo Longsworth, Lot Delineator Like A Vitamin You Ingest With Your Eyes. html:
President Donald Trump will accept a luxury Boeing 747-8 jumbo jet as a gift from the ruling family of Qatar with the intention of converting it to a presidential aircraft, the “palace in the sky” potentially being the most valuable gift ever extended to the United States from a foreign government. What do you think?

“Foreign competition will completely destroy the American bribe industry.” 

Theodore Coleman, Train Custodian

“Does Trump even know how to fly a plane?”

Paige Albers, Triathlon Applauder

“Qatar is going to be so embarrassed when Trump realizes the plane was rebribed.”

Hugo Longsworth, Lot Delineator
